title: With the removal of legion aura
body:
Who should one build locket on? Who against? Is a support item even a support item without cdr? (These are the jokes people)

Also, what about banner? I only built it when I needed both AP and MR and either already had or for some reason could not use abyssal. I suppose it has always been good against all AP teams on aram too now that I think about it. I think it might actually see more play rather than less with these changes.

Are you guys and gals happy with the new direction?

replies.body: Considering I am guilty of buying Banner of Command on Irelia in it's reworked form, anyone who is building somewhat tanky could consider locket or banner now.
I hadn't even considered I reliable for banner but I can see what you mean now. Thanks for the response

I cant see locket being a viable item now that the aura is gone so it will probably see little to no play in S7. Banner might still be good for lane preassure.

Personally i think {{item:3800}} will take its place as the new support item. Its got better stats now and the active i think will be better for enguages and disenguages. Sort of a "pick and choose your team fight" tool.
That's really interesting thank you for helping me.
